name: Nightwatch RPG
description:
Nightwatch RPG is an action-packed rpg with expanded lore and colorful cast. As a player you can fight criminals, visit new places and help form Nightwatch – a team of superheroes fighting for justice in the city of Porthaven. Immerse yourself in rich and compeletly new origin story. Discover Porthaven, a city full of lore and wonder.

Play the demo now (PL only)

Check out our demo release featuring the first chapter of the story (currently available only in polish, english version will follow soon).

Upcoming   Features

Action – fight with criminals, monsters and evil-doers, level up your team and learn new skills to help you fight for justice!

Absorbing story – learn about origins of your favourite superheroes, their foes, the city of Porthaven, and many, many more!

Explore – Discover Porthaven, a city full of lore, wonder and criminals you have to fight with!

Visit our website for more news about the game!
